as.description: The element or component the ComboboxOption should render as.
as.description_zh: ComboboxOption 应呈现为的元素或组件。

disabled.description:
Whether or not the option should be disabled for keyboard navigation and
ARIA purposes.
disabled.description_zh:
是否应为键盘导航禁用该选项，以及
ARIA 目的。

slots.name: active
slots.description: Whether or not the option is the active/focused option.
slots.description_zh: 选项是否为 active/focused 选项。

slots.name: selected
slots.description: Whether or not the option is the selected option.

slots.name: disabled
slots.description:
Whether or not the option is the disabled for keyboard navigation and ARIA
purposes.
slots.description_zh:
该选项是否对键盘导航和 ARIA 处于禁用状态
目的。
